mapper.select:
SELECT p.hp_position_id,p.hp_company_id,c.com_name,p.pos_name,ps.lower_num,ps.hight_num,aco.county_name,aci.city_name, p.group_on,p.start_time,p.end_time,p.hot_on,p.car_on,p.pos_nature,p.welfare_on, p.ret_on,p.ret_man_money,p.ret_woman_money,p.urgent_on,p.urgent_money,, p.three_money,p.five_money, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(pw.welfare_name) FROM hp_position_ref_welfare prw JOIN hp_position_welfare pw WHERE prw.hp_position_id=p.hp_position_id AND prw.hp_position_welfare_id=pw.hp_position_welfare_id) welfareArr, (SELECT COUNT(pru.hp_position_ref_user_id) FROM hp_position_group pg JOIN hp_position_ref_user pru WHERE pg.hp_position_id=p.hp_position_id AND p.group_on=1 AND pg.hp_position_group_id=pru.hp_position_group_id) groupSccNum
,pru1.part_time,(pg.end_time-#{curTime}) groupLeftTime,u1.user_name leaderName,u1.header_pic leaderPic, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hp_position_ref_user pru2 WHERE pru2.hp_position_group_id=pg.hp_position_group_id ) groupPartNum
FROM hp_position p JOIN hp_company c ON p.hp_company_id=c.hp_company_id JOIN hp_position_salary ps ON p.hp_position_salary_id=ps.hp_position_salary_id JOIN hp_area_county aco ON p.county_id=aco.county_id JOIN hp_area_city aci ON aco.city_id=aci.city_id LEFT JOIN hp_position_type pt ON p.hp_position_type_id=pt.hp_position_type_id
JOIN hp_position_ref_user pru1 ON p.hp_position_id=pru1.hp_position_id LEFT JOIN hp_position_group pg ON pru1.hp_position_group_id=pg.hp_position_group_id LEFT JOIN hp_user u1 ON pg.hp_user_id=u1.hp_user_id
LEFT JOIN hp_position_require pr ON p.hp_position_id=pr.hp_position_id WHERE p.start_time <=#{curTime} AND p.end_time >=#{curTime} AND p.pos_state=1 AND p.del_on=0 AND p.hot_on=#{hotOn} AND p.pos_nature=#{posNature} AND p.ret_on=#{retOn} AND p.welfare_on=#{welfareOn} AND p.urgent_on=#{urgentOn} AND p.group_on=#{groupOn} AND aci.city_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cityName},'%')
AND (pt.type_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') OR p.pos_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') OR c.com_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') )
AND pru1.hp_user_id=
ORDER BY p.apply_time desc,p.hp_position_id desc

SELECT pg.*,u.real_name leader_name,u.header_pic leader_pic,c.com_name,p.pos_name,ps.lower_num,ps.hight_num, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hp_position_ref_user pru WHERE pru.hp_position_group_id=pg.hp_position_group_id) partNum, (pg.end_time-#{curTime}) leftTime FROM hp_company c JOIN hp_position p ON c.hp_company_id=p.hp_company_id JOIN hp_position_group pg ON p.hp_position_id=pg.hp_position_id LEFT JOIN hp_user u ON pg.hp_user_id=u.hp_user_id LEFT JOIN hp_position_salary ps ON p.hp_position_salary_id=ps.hp_position_salary_id WHERE p.hp_position_id=#{hpPositionId} AND p.group_on=1 AND p.del_on=0 AND pg.end_time>#{curTime} AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hp_position_ref_user pru WHERE pru.hp_position_group_id=pg.hp_position_group_id) <5 ORDER BY pg.end_time,pg.hp_position_group_id desc LIMIT #{currentResult},#{showCount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hp_position p JOIN hp_position_group pg ON p.hp_position_id=pg.hp_position_id WHERE p.hp_position_id=#{hpPositionId} AND p.del_on=0 AND p.group_on=1 AND pg.end_time>#{curTime} AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hp_position_ref_user pru WHERE pru.hp_position_group_id=pg.hp_position_group_id) <3

SELECT pg.hp_position_group_id,pg.hp_position_id,pg.start_time,pg.end_time, c.com_name,p.pos_name,c.com_logo,pru.hp_user_id,u.header_pic,ps.lower_num,ps.hight_num, p.pos_com_desc,CASE WHEN pg.end_time <#{curTime} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END groupStatus, (pg.end_time-#{curTime}) leftTime,c.approve_state,
IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hp_position_ref_user pru1 WHERE pru1.hp_user_id= AND pru1.hp_position_group_id=pg.hp_position_group_id )>0,1,0) userIsPart
0 userIsPart
FROM hp_company c JOIN hp_position p ON c.hp_company_id=p.hp_company_id JOIN hp_position_group pg ON p.hp_position_id=pg.hp_position_id JOIN hp_position_ref_user pru ON pg.hp_position_group_id=pru.hp_position_group_id JOIN hp_user u ON pru.hp_user_id=u.hp_user_id LEFT JOIN hp_position_salary ps ON p.hp_position_salary_id=ps.hp_position_salary_id WHERE pg.hp_position_group_id=#{hpPositionGroupId}
SELECT p.hp_position_id,p.start_time,p.end_time,p.group_on,p.del_on FROM hp_position p WHERE p.hp_position_id=#{hpPositionId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hp_position_ref_user pru WHERE pru.hp_position_group_id=#{hpPositionGroupId}

SELECT p.*,c.hp_company_id,c.com_name,, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(pw.hp_position_welfare_id) FROM hp_position_ref_welfare prw JOIN hp_position_welfare pw WHERE prw.hp_position_id=p.hp_position_id AND prw.hp_position_welfare_id=pw.hp_position_welfare_id) welfareArr, aco.county_id,aco.county_name,aci.city_id,aci.city_name,ap.province_id,ap.province_name
FROM hp_position p JOIN hp_company c ON p.hp_company_id=c.hp_company_id LEFT JOIN hp_position_salary ps ON p.hp_position_salary_id=ps.hp_position_salary_id LEFT JOIN hp_area_county aco ON p.county_id=aco.county_id LEFT JOIN hp_area_city aci ON aco.city_id=aci.city_id LEFT JOIN hp_area_province ap ON aci.province_id=ap.province_id LEFT JOIN hp_position_require pr ON p.hp_position_id=pr.hp_position_id WHERE p.hp_position_id=#{hpPositionId}
SELECT pr.hp_position_require_id FROM hp_position_require pr WHERE pr.hp_position_id=#{hpPositionId} LIMIT 1
